== Edit ==

== Biography ==

Mark was born on 19 March 1904 in Whitechapel, London.<ref>SCHAMROFSKY, Marks. GRO Birth Index. Name: SCHAMROFSKY, Marks, District: WHITECHAPEL, Volume:  1C, Page:  291. FreeBMD database online: https://www.freebmd.org.uk/cgi/information.pl?cite=9c%2Beml2g2%2FXjh0ouIun73Q&scan=1</ref>

He married [[Lichtenstein-152 | Eva Lichtenstein]] on 10 June 1926. <ref>CHEMEROFSKY, Mark. GRO Birth Index. Name: CHEMEROFSKY, Mark, Spouse: LICHTENSTEIN, District: Bethnal Green, Volume:  1c, Page:  356. FreeBMD database online: https://www.freebmd.org.uk/cgi/information.pl?cite=E45S2g4z%2B0h%2FeSXhdkp6%2BA&scan=1</ref>

The marriage didn't last long and they separated, probably in 1931.<ref name="Convo JC">Conversations with his daughter [[Schemerofsky-1 | Jacqueline Callender]]</ref>

Mark married Florence May Dix on 21 January 1941. <ref>Morris, Mark. GRO Birth Index. Name: Morris, Mark, Spouse: DIX, District: Islington, Volume:  1B, Page:  413. FreeBMD database online: https://www.freebmd.org.uk/cgi/information.pl?cite=MTEKg1Xt4232DQxyl8k%2Bdw&scan=1</ref>

Mark died in Islington on 11 March 1974.<ref>MORRIS, Mark. GRO Birth Index. Name: MORRIS, Mark, Registered Q1 1974, Birthdate: 19-Mar-1904, District: Islington, Volume:  5C, Page:  1926. FreeBMD database online: https://www.freebmd.org.uk/cgi/information.pl?cite=vEV8UQu3mWn5GgmVtrxfog&scan=1</ref>
